document.full_text: india stepped up its push to deepen its economic ties with africa and emerge from the shadow of rival china by offering $5 billion to help the continent rich with minerals and commodities.
document.title: india offers $5 billion to africa in bid to boost ties
lines_and_colors: india stepped up its push to deepen its economic ties with africa and emerge from the shadow of rival china by offering $5 billion to help the continent rich with minerals and commodities.
